body_html: In general, many GPU reduction ops in TensorFlow uses atomic operations, which are non-deterministic. Normally, this is considered fine. It is only an indication of errors if there are large difference within a single step.
body_text: In general, many GPU reduction ops in TensorFlow uses atomic operations, which are non-deterministic. Normally, this is considered fine. It is only an indication of errors if there are large difference within a single step.
body: In general, many GPU reduction ops in TensorFlow uses atomic operations, which are non-deterministic. Normally, this is considered fine. It is only an indication of errors if there are large difference within a single step.
